{"id":1284854188,"question_id":3450,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1718107280,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1284854188/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Child Who Has the Ball After K Seconds","memory":"16.5 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def numberOfChild(self, n: int, k: int) -> int:\n        alt = 0\n        flag = 0\n        m = [i for i in range(n)]\n        \n        while k != 0:\n            if alt == n-1:\n                flag = 0\n            elif alt == 0:\n                flag = 1\n            \n            if flag == 1:\n                alt += 1 \n            else:\n                alt -= 1\n            k -= 1\n        return m[alt]","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-child-who-has-the-ball-after-k-seconds","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
